LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Frostwolf.label: 霜狼
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Frostwolf.description: Frost wolves are a species of arctic wolves native to Draenor. The ones in Alterac followed the Frostwolf clan from Draenor. Amidst the cold heights of Frostfire, the frostwolves hunt anything they can catch. The fastest among them eat well. A first-fang is the first of many shed by an adolescent frost wolf pup when their adult teeth begin growing. The Frostwolf Orcs often keep the first-fang of their animal companion as good luck charms.
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Frostwolf.tools.0.label: 左爪
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Frostwolf.tools.1.label: 右爪
